hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Passionate about web development, I create high-performance and scalable applications. From concept to deployment, I develop complete web applications that meet business needs and user expectations.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Discover my journey and ambitions
about.journey_p1: Currently pursuing a Master 2 MBDS at Université Côte d'Azur, I combine solid academic training with hands-on professional experience. My journey has allowed me to work on various projects, from internal application development to creating complex SaaS platforms.
about.journey_p2: I am particularly interested in scalable architectures, performance optimization, and continuous improvement of user experience.

linkuma.desc: Netlinking SaaS for SEO agencies. Automated campaign management, credit payments and analytics.
tasks: Client interface - Credit payment by transfer, transaction tracking
Admin interface - Traceability (IP, logs), smart alerts
PBN Management - WordPress integration, auto publishing
SEO Analytics - Ranxplorer, keyword and traffic tracking

crm.desc: Internal CRM to manage WordPress site production (Kubio). Multi-team workflow and validation.
tasks: Stats & Revenue - Reporting by project manager

supervision.desc: Client domain monitoring, DNS detection, SSL tracking and real-time network security.
tasks: PostgreSQL Configuration in a Dockerized Environment

rh.desc: Complete HR application with 5 roles (Admin, HR, Manager, Employee, Shareholder), leave, stock and payroll modules.
tasks: Leave - Manager→HR workflow, auto balance, day calculation

mazars.desc: Complete development of an internal mission management and billing application for an audit firm.

furniture.name: Furniture Manufacturing
furniture.desc: Order management, production tracking, material and labor cost calculation.

library.name: Library
library.desc: Application composed of a reader front office, an administrator back office, and an API for managing the catalog, borrowings, and reservations.

garage.name: Garage Management
garage.desc: Automotive diagnostics, repair tracking and customer payment management.
